articles.title: Chile study shows first Sinovac shot alone not protective - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: SANTIAGO, Chile - A study in Chile, which has one of the furthest-advanced vaccination campaigns in South America -- mainly with China's Coronavac, has found that a first dose alone does not protect against coronavirus infection.
